turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I like to order a blonde espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, just a single shot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, did you want any sugars with it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and at which location would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there are a few locations, which one would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there are 7 locations on colorado blvd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks in University Hills, sounds good?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, one moment while i send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're all set! your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you. You, too. Bye.
